reference.shortdesc: Use the xmlatt element to identify mentions of XML attributes, for example, audience.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The xmlatt element enables more precise semantic searching of the DITA source; it also enables distinct formatting, such as preceding the name of the attribute with a commercial at (@) sign. The content of the xmlatt element should be the attribute name without commercial at or equals (=) characters.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: The <xmlatt>collection-type</xmlatt> and <xmlatt>linking</xmlatt> attributes affect how related links are generated for topics that are referenced in the DITA map.
